title: Enhancing Language Learning Competencies Through Peer Interaction in Hybrid e-Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Application of constructivist collaborative learning in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, combining offline classes with online interaction in a hybrid learning model

learning_goals: Learners can collaborate with peers to complete language tasks and exchange feedback.
Learners can evaluate language outputs (e.g., oral presentations, written compositions) according to peer assessment criteria.
Learners can produce collaborative language learning outcomes with peers using online tools at least four times.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
